title: BEHIND EVERY DECEPTION
cleaned_text:
Behind Every Deception of Satan is an Evil Agenda

The whole purpose behind the New World Order is to deceive people to worship the Antichrist when he comes. 2nd Thessalonians 2:10 plainly teaches that the masses will be deceived by the Antichrist because they received not the love of THE TRUTH. Luciferians aren't going to openly acknowledge that their goal is to lead people to worship Lucifer; so instead they tell people that the goal of the New World Order is to unite people in cooperation, a better understanding of each other, and respect for life and the earth. The truth is veiled.

Henry Kissinger said in his Kissinger Report 2004 that the best way to promote population control is under the pretense of helping third world children in poverty. There are numerous websites and television commercials, which feature poor and malnourished third world children, appealing to people's hearts to support humanitarian relief organizations; but behind it all is an evil agenda to deceptively sterilize teenage girls, so they'll never be able to get pregnant. It doesn't surprise me in a bloodthirsty society like America, where babies are aborted by the tens-of-millions, that these same evil people would be supportive of population control in third world nations.

Freemasonry is behind so many deceptions today; including evolution, Communism, Feminism, the homosexual agenda, the abortion agenda, the divorce agenda, the O.J. Simpson laws that demonize husbands, vaccine programs, Mormonism, the Jehovah Witnesses, the Christian Science religion, Seventh-Day Adventism, Scientology, Walt Disney, modern corrupt Bibles, Hollywood, the bogus War on Drugs, the population control agenda, the heathen music industry [including Contemporary Christian Music], the bogus War on Terror, the corrupt legal system, the bogus War on Illiteracy, Wall Street, the Federal Reserve Banking system, and a host of other evils ruining and destroying our society. There is a demonic agenda to destroy your family! Freemasonry has it's people planted into the highest positions of legislative, executive, military, representative and judicial areas of government. They are the scum of the earth.

Everything is a deception. Feminism promises to empower women; but leaves them childless, divorced and broken. Vaccinations supposedly keep children healthy; but instead make them sick and sterilized. Children are forced into public schools to be educated; but are deliberately dumbed down by making simple subjects extremely confusing and complicated to learn. They are taught that life came from stardust instead of a divine Creator. Evolution is bad science, just as Global Warming is bad science.

Planned Parenthood doesn't plan for any woman to be a mother. The plan is to kill, kill, kill. Where does the part about becoming a “mother” come into play? What a bunch of liars! Our government leaders promise more jobs; while corporations continue to outsource tens-of-millions of jobs to foreign soil. Everything keeps getting worse; while politicians keep lying that things are going to get better. It's all a bunch of lying deceptions. As we approach nearer to the End Times, we are seeing an increase in deceptions, in a dumbed down society that is vulnerable. but also in the deceivableness of unrighteousness that 2nd Thessalonians 2:10 warns about.

Alimony is a form of Communism. The Bible teaches that if a person doesn't work, they shouldn't eat. A women who receives alimony should have to work for that money. To force a man to support his former wife without her having to do any work whatsoever to receive that money is evil. A man certainly has no Biblical obligation to financially support a rebellious wife. Only in a heathen society that rebels against God, can a women disobey her husband and be rewarded for doing so. Men are sick and tired of being abused by a God-cursed system controlled by abortionists, lesbians, feminists, atheists, and God-hating reprobates. Feminism is the rot of society.

American women have been sinfully taught via feminism to be intolerant of their husbands. Police have been sinfully trained to overreact to even the slightest allegations, use maximum force, and ask questions later. The U.S. court system is evil and corrupt, catering to feminists and home-wreckers, destroying families and ruining lives. The judges and lawyers make lots of money, the banks steal people's homes, the women get section-8 and welfare, the kids are taken control over by the State, and the man loses his God-given authority over his wife and children. It is evil beyond imagination. God hates this wickedness, which is an agenda to destroy America one family at a time. In eternity, God will avenge the authority of the man. God is the divine Judge, and every knee will bow in total submission on that day. The Bible says that God's wrath will be

Bible publishers claim to put out new versions to eliminate confusion; but for every additional Bible being published, people are that much more confused. Apostate ecumenical ministers claim to bring people to Christ; but never before have so many people been turned away from the saving power of the Gospel. Not one Contemporary Christian Music [CCM] singer shares the Gospel on their website with fans. In their music they sing of being born-again as a mere feeling or experience, denying the power thereof (2nd Timothy 3:5).

The Jehovah Witnesses' New World Translation is a deception intended to lead people away from THE TRUTH, and into a false cult that is part of the New World Order. Charles Russell has a giant Illuminati pyramid on his grave. JW's donated a pyramid to place upon Mary Baker Eddy's grave, who founded Christian Science, to commemorate her 100th birthday. 



Thankfully, God sees all. Proverb 15:3, “The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.” God ponders the hearts of men. Proverb 5:21, “For the ways of man are before the eyes of the LORD, and he pondereth all his goings.” To “ponder” means to think at length and in depth. God pays detailed attention to everything that people think, say and do. There won't be a jury on Judgment Day, because God already KNOWS all the facts and details about every person's life. No one will be able to argue with God and win.

No one can deceive God. That is why the Bible is so important and precious, because God's Word never changes. Men may pervert the truth of God's Word (Romans 1:25); but the Word itself cannot be corrupted (1st Peter 1:23). God's Word is settled forever in Heaven (Psalm 119:89). Men may change, but God never changes (Malachi 3:6).

So many people have been deceived in this world, in so many ways. Proverb 21:2, “Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the LORD pondereth the hearts.” Again we find that word “ponder.” God doesn't miss a thing. No one is fooling God. Isaiah 13:11, “And I will punish the world for their evil, and the wicked for their iniquity; and I will cause the arrogancy of the proud to cease, and will lay low the haughtiness of the terrible.”



Satan is a liar of liars, and a deceiver of deceivers. As I research and study what is going on in the world, I am saddened by the amount of fraud, deceptions, liars, fakes, scams, illusions, tyranny, falsehoods, et cetera. Literally, everything is a conspiracy. The stench of wickedness and corruption reaches into Heaven. Ecclesiastes 5:8, “If thou seest the oppression of the poor, and violent perverting of judgment and justice in a province, marvel not at the matter: for he that is higher than the highest regardeth; and there be higher than they.”

Even so-called Christian bookstores, Contemporary Christians Music [CCM] singers and ecumenical ministers are all so fraudulent, comprised and apostate. None of them have a passion to warn people about the approacing judgment of Hell, fire and damnation. Doesn't anyone believe that Hell exists?

The Pharisees were a bunch of religious phonies. When John the Baptist saw them coming in Matthew 3:7, he said to them, “O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?” Unlike the Pharisees, John warned people about God's wrath against Christ-rejecting sinners. John taught repentance toward God, for the forgiveness of sins. John baptized those who were already saved, as a public profession of their faith.

There is hardly any mention these days about eternal punishment in the Lake of Fire. Many ministers mention it in their statement of faith; but publicly never mention it, knowing that 95% of their listeners won't look at their statement of faith. They are deceitful. Many ministers say one thing in their statement of faith, and then another when in public.

Good luck finding anything on ChristianityToday.com about burning in Hell forever as punishment for sin. One common denominator of all apostate religious teachers today is that none of them preach about eternal punishment. Billy Graham is not sure if Hell has fire. We'll get a Bible and then you'll KNOW! Revelation 21:8 warns of the second death, being tormented forever in a Lake that burneth with fire and brimstone. Hell has fire!!!

If you are using a corrupted New International Version [NIV], then you are using the same corrupt manuscripts of heretics Westcott and Hort from which the Jehovah Witnesses' New World Translation [NWT] comes. Only the trustworthy King James Bibles comes from a different source of Hebrew and Greek manuscripts. Bless God I want a Bible that mentions the Godhead, Calvary, the mercyseat, propitiation, the bottomless pit, regeneration, and hundreds of other important words that modern Bibles remove. I want a Bible that teaches THE TRUTH that Jesus is God Almighty, and not just “a god” as the New World Translation says.

Freemasonry is behind so many deceptions today; including evolution, Communism, Feminism, the homosexual agenda, the abortion agenda, the divorce agenda, the O.J. The Love of Money is the Root of All Evil

Colossians 3:5 teaches that covetousness is idolatry, which brings God's wrath. Covetousness brings God's wrath. It is the love of money that corrupts so many men, who gladly sell their souls for success, fame and fortune.

Covetousness is the love of money. Covetousness is doing wrong to obtain something. It is cheating people, pressuring people, conniving and taking advantage of people's fears and misfortune to increase one's personal wealth. Credit Card companies deliberately attempt to put people in debt, which is the sin of covetousness. Lawyers deliberately scare people during times of calamity, exploiting their fears to swindle their money. Realtors lie about the condition of a home, just to make a sale. It is covetousness. Used car salesman lie. Covetous pastors use high-pressure tactics on their congregations, to scare them into giving more money. Greed is everywhere we turn. People are so dishonest and mean. People will lie, cheat, take their clothes off, fornicate, kill, swindle people's homes, connive and steal to get money. God hates deception, a heart that deviseth wicked scams, and taking advantage of others (Proverb 6:16-19). The love of money is the root of all evil (1st Timothy 6:10). Sadly, life has deteriorated in America to people hurting people. 



The most hideous evil scam of the 20th century is the Federal Reserve Act of 1913, which gave the criminal Banksters unprecedented power ever the economy of the united States; causing The Great Depression of and official bankruptcy of the U.S. federal government in 1933. Everything from our homes, cars, clothes and food we eat are completely controlled by the Federal Reserve Bankers, who control interest rates; and thus, the value of our dollar. It's massive fraud.

All legal documents are written up by lawyers to hurt the consumer. All realtor contracts read like a lawyer's contract. The buyer and seller lose out; but the realtor stands to profit regardless if anything goes wrong. The business world is cruel, cutthroat, greedy and dishonest. It is crooked. Lawyers have control over everything these days and it's risky to do business with anyone who deals in contracts. America is infested with ambulance-chasing lawyers who will stoop lower than low to make money. They encourage people to divorce just to get the money. They're evil scum!

God hates when evil people seek to profit from the calamity of others, preferring to destroy a marriage rather than trying to enroll the couple into marriage counseling. Feminism has brainwashed women to become intolerable of their husbands. It wasn't like this in the old days. Police these days are trained to overreact, break apart families, and destroy lives. The court system is evil, controlled by sympathizers for abortionists, homosexuals, and feminists; thus, protecting the rights of evil people, and attacking the God-given rights of husbands, fathers and Christians. The consequences have been devastating in America. Our families are in ruins.

Lies, lies, lies! Deception is everywhere. After the evil elite criminals behind the 911 attacks murdered over 2,700 innocent people, including 300 firefighters, they placed an All-Seeing-Eye at ground zero to mock us. They dare to call it a memorial. It's their way of saying loud and clear, WE DID IT! We blew up those buildings. Sadly, the average person is so stupid that they can't figure it out. Look at the back of every U.S. one dollar bill. That Masonic pyramid means we're becoming their slaves! That's why all the jobs are gone in America to overseas labor. That's why all our homes are gone to the criminal thieving Banksters. That's why public schools are making kids dumber than ever. That's why the Federal Reserve Banksters are ripping us off left and right, and nothing is being done about it, nothing! God is very angry, and has promised to punish the wicked (Isaiah 13:11).
